titleStmt.title: Zions deliverance and her friends duty: or The grounds of expecting, and meanes of procuring Jerusalems restauration. In a sermon preached at a publicke fast, before the Honourable House of Commons. By William Sedgvvicke, minister of Farnham in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Sedgwick, William, 1609 or 10-1669?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Bellamy, & Ralph Smith, at the three Golden Lyons in Corne-hill,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at a fast before the Honourable House of Commons.
Late copies have two errors corrected on p. 7: line 19, "Syrus" corrected to "Cyrus"; and line 4 from botton, "Sand-ballet" corrected to "Sanballat".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the three Golden Lyons in Corne-hill
